overview: Norman is in love with his girlfriend Jessica but she takes a job opportunity out of town and decides to break up with him. Then he meets Lola, a beautiful girl with many things in common. They start to date but Jessica gets back and want everything to be as before. Now Norman has to decide between the love of his life and his soul mate.
tagline: ¿Con quién te quedarías, con el amor de tu vida o con tu alma gemela?
title: Tenías que ser tú
